Pre-Game Insights: Greene has a team-best batting average of.262 and leads the Tigers in home runs (24) and runs batted in (74).
Matthew Boyd, the Guardians' starter, has a 2.72 ERA and 10.4 strikeouts per nine innings this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers and Guardians are tied 2-2 in the ALDS.
The game will be played at 1:08 PM ET on October 12, 2024, on Max.
